text: Five people, including a 15-year-old girl, have died of Ebola in a fresh outbreak of the virus in the Democratic Republic of Congo, UNICEF says. Nine cases total have been reported, according to the organization. https://t.co/ieHdTS5xol

name: CNN
text:
Air travel is nowhere near pre-pandemic levels. But it began bouncing back last month.

The TSA says it screened nearly 949,000 passengers over the past weekend. It scanned roughly half that number of people, 476,000, over the first weekend in May. https://t.co/TSNNecVBTa
